subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chad Barrett scored two goals to lift Toronto F.C. to a 3-1 victory against the Red Bulls on Saturday night in East Rutherford, N.J. Abdus Ibrahim also scored for Toronto (8-12-7). Dane Richards had the lone goal for the Red Bulls (9-10-8), who dropped their third straight game and fourth in five matches. The goal was Richards’s third of the season.
